name: Rocket Man (DailyCRafter)
description:
Enjoy the wind brushing across your face as you race through pillars to become the numer one rocket man!

Volume warning: Seems to be loud on most systems, lower volume for best experince, or listen to these bangers on high!

A game created for the

Miz Jam

Jam, i set a personal constraint of 48HRS, and was able to make this game in the process, i tried to be original with the art kit by taking what seemed like a top down art kit and turning it into a more jet pack joyride like game, i would like to add buffs and debuffs as well as enemies you can kill to get modifiers later on but, this is what i was able to make and i hope you enjoy it!
